page.title: 15PRIVATE & SPECIAL EDUCATION
page.content:
{WESTWNG SCHOOL}is an independent day and boarding school founded in 1870. It moved to Kyneton House in 1960. It has space for 100 8-16 yr old girls. There are 16 members of staff and the class sizes are small (10-20 approx). At junior level the girls cover a basic course. From 13 they prepare for G.C.E. or C.S.E. exams. They are able to study English, R.E., History, Geography, Maths, Science, Computing, Latin, French, Art, Music, Needlework, Home Economics, and Typing.
{THE SHEILING SCHOOL}is part of the Camphill Movement. It cares for 6-16 yr old children with special learning difficulties.They live as families with the co-workers in one of the 6 "homes".There is an further annexe, known as{The Hatch}which caters for 18 -25 yr olds.
